abstract: For more than 20 years, Frank Yeary advised a host of corporate chieftains on strategic decisions, in his role as an investment banker for mergers and acquisitions.
lead_paragraph: For more than 20 years, Frank Yeary advised a host of corporate chieftains on strategic decisions, in his role as an investment banker for mergers and acquisitions.

headline.main: From Citi to Cal: A Top Banker Moves On
